pLm4lGF0rRDVnrVj.name: Pry Open
pLm4lGF0rRDVnrVj.description:
Requirements: A hand free, a crowbar

Make a melee weapon attack against a creature within 5 feet of you that is wearing armor. On a hit, you wedge the crowbar into the joints of the armor and pry, snapping straps, distorting plates, and otherwise leaving your target exposed. Your target takes 1d4 points of bludgeoning damage and suffers a -2 penalty to their AC until they spend a minute fixing their armor. A creature can only suffer from one instance of the AC reduction of this ability at a time.
